snippet: The exercises are taking place as a maritime dispute between China and the Philippines continues in the Scarborough Shoal, a disputed string of rock outcroppings.
abstract: Philippines and the United States begin joint military exercises that will include mock beach invasions along coastlines facing China; exercises are taking place as a maritime standoff between China and the Philippines continues in the Scarborough Shoal, a disputed string of rock outcroppings near the northern Philippines.
lead_paragraph: The exercises are taking place as a maritime dispute between China and the Philippines continues in the Scarborough Shoal, a disputed string of rock outcroppings.

headline.seo: U.S.-Philippines War Games Held Amid Tensions With China
headline.main: U.S.-Philippine War Games Start Amid China Standoff
headline.print_headline: U.S.-Philippine War Games Start Amid China Standoff
